title: Be Sincere Even When You Don't Mean It
description: Be Sincere Even When You Don’t Mean ItA laugh out loud fictional insider look into Football, The Apollo Moon Program, Golf, Astrophysics, The Hawaii Ironman, The Educational System, and Dysfunctional Family Relations. Also included Free of Charge: Very Questionable Self-Help suggestions on how to run your life.Does contain locker room language.Fun to read, yet informative.Jim Flynn’s first published piece was the true story of what it’s like to bet all your money on Final Jeopardy-and get it wrong
author: Jim      Flynn
